mapper.select: SELECT d.date, max_balance AS balance FROM tbl_address_daily_aggregation a INNER JOIN tbl_date d ON a.date_id = d.id WHERE address = #{address} AND token_contract_hash = #{tokenContractHash} AND date_id > 0 AND max_balance = ( SELECT max_balance AS balance FROM tbl_address_daily_aggregation WHERE address = #{address} AND token_contract_hash = #{tokenContractHash} AND date_id <= 0 AND date_id <> -1 AND date_id <> -(~0 >> 33) - 1 ORDER BY update_time DESC LIMIT 1 ) ORDER BY date_id LIMIT 1

SELECT d.date, min_balance AS balance FROM tbl_address_daily_aggregation a INNER JOIN tbl_date d ON a.date_id = d.id WHERE address = #{address} AND token_contract_hash = #{tokenContractHash} AND date_id > 0 AND min_balance = ( SELECT min_balance AS balance FROM tbl_address_daily_aggregation WHERE address = #{address} AND token_contract_hash = #{tokenContractHash} AND date_id <= 0 AND date_id <> -1 AND date_id <> -(~0 >> 33) - 1 ORDER BY update_time DESC LIMIT 1 ) ORDER BY date_id LIMIT 1

SELECT ifnull(sum(aggr.deposit_tx_count + aggr.withdraw_tx_count), 0) FROM tbl_address_daily_aggregation aggr
INNER JOIN tbl_oep4 o ON o.contract_hash = aggr.token_contract_hash AND o.audit_flag = 1
INNER JOIN tbl_oep5 o ON o.contract_hash = aggr.token_contract_hash AND o.audit_flag = 1
INNER JOIN tbl_orc20 o ON o.contract_hash = aggr.token_contract_hash AND o.audit_flag = 1
INNER JOIN tbl_orc721 o ON o.contract_hash = aggr.token_contract_hash AND o.audit_flag = 1
INNER JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT contract_hash FROM tbl_orc1155 WHERE audit_flag = 1) o ON o.contract_hash = aggr.token_contract_hash
INNER JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT contract_hash FROM tbl_oep8 WHERE audit_flag = 1) o ON o.contract_hash = aggr.token_contract_hash
WHERE aggr.address = #{address} AND aggr.date_id = -(~0 >> 33) - 1
